instruction: Create a simple iron gear wheel production line using an assembling machine and inserters
objective: Create a simple iron gear wheel production line using an assembling machine and inserters
steps:
To create a simple iron gear wheel production line in Factorio using an assembling machine and inserters, follow these steps:

1. Set up iron ore mining:
   - Place electric mining drills on iron ore patches
   - Connect the drills to electricity

2. Establish iron plate smelting:
   - Place stone furnaces or electric furnaces near the iron ore output
   - Use inserters to feed iron ore into the furnaces
   - Use inserters to remove iron plates from the furnaces

3. Set up the assembling machine:
   - Place an assembling machine 1 or 2 near the iron plate output
   - Set the assembling machine recipe to produce iron gear wheels

4. Create the input line:
   - Use transport belts to bring iron plates from the smelting area to the assembling machine
   - Place an inserter to feed iron plates from the belt into the assembling machine

5. Set up the output:
   - Place an inserter to remove finished iron gear wheels from the assembling machine
   - Use a transport belt or chest to collect the produced iron gear wheels

6. Power the system:
   - Ensure all components (mining drills, inserters, and assembling machine) are connected to a power source

7. Optimize and scale (optional):
   - Add more assembling machines as needed
   - Use faster inserters or belt types to increase throughput
   - Consider using modules in the assembling machines to improve efficiency

This setup will create a basic iron gear wheel production line that can be easily expanded or integrated into larger factory designs.

corrections.snippet:
# Place an electric mining drill on an iron ore patch
iron_ore_patch = get_resource_patch(Resource.IronOre, nearest(Resource.IronOre))
assert iron_ore_patch, "No iron ore patch found nearby"

mining_drill = place_entity(Prototype.ElectricMiningDrill, position=iron_ore_patch.bounding_box.center)
assert mining_drill, "Failed to place electric mining drill"

# Place a stone furnace near the mining drill
furnace_pos = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, mining_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace_pos, "Failed to place stone furnace"

# Place inserters to move ore from drill to furnace and plates from furnace
drill_to_furnace = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, position=Position(x=(mining_drill.position.x + furnace_pos.position.x) / 2, y=mining_drill.position.y))
assert drill_to_furnace, "Failed to place inserter between drill and furnace"

furnace_output = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, furnace_pos.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert furnace_output, "Failed to place inserter for furnace output"

# Place assembling machine for iron gear wheel production
assembling_machine = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1, furnace_output.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert assembling_machine, "Failed to place assembling machine"

# Set recipe for assembling machine
recipe_set = set_entity_recipe(assembling_machine, Prototype.IronGearWheel)
assert recipe_set, "Failed to set iron gear wheel recipe for assembling machine"

# Place inserter to feed iron plates into assembling machine
plate_to_assembler = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, position=Position(x=(furnace_output.position.x + assembling_machine.position.x) / 2, y=furnace_output.position.y))
assert plate_to_assembler, "Failed to place inserter between furnace and assembling machine"

# Place chest for output and inserter to move gear wheels to chest
output_chest = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.WoodenChest, assembling_machine.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert output_chest, "Failed to place output chest"

assembler_to_chest = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, position=Position(x=(assembling_machine.position.x + output_chest.position.x) / 2, y=assembling_machine.position.y))
assert assembler_to_chest, "Failed to place inserter between assembling machine and chest"

# Verify the setup
entities = inspect_entities(radius=20)
assert entities.get_entity(Prototype.ElectricMiningDrill), "Electric mining drill not found in inspection"
assert entities.get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace), "Stone furnace not found in inspection"
assert len(entities.get_entities(Prototype.BurnerInserter)) >= 4, "Not enough inserters found in inspection"
assert entities.get_entity(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1), "Assembling machine not found in inspection"
assert entities.get_entity(Prototype.WoodenChest), "Output chest not found in inspection"

print("Iron gear wheel production line set up successfully!")

# Wait for production to start
sleep(30)

# Check if iron gear wheels are being produced
chest_inventory = inspect_inventory(output_chest)
assert chest_inventory.get(Prototype.IronGearWheel, 0) > 0, "No iron gear wheels found in output chest after 30 seconds"

print(f"Iron gear wheels in output chest: {chest_inventory.get(Prototype.IronGearWheel)}")
print("Iron gear wheel production line is working correctly!")
